headline: Permian Gas Wave Sparks Biggest Pipeline Buildout Since the Shale Boom
summary: Surging demand from LNG exporters, data centers, and manufacturing is driving a $50 billion investment boom.

raw.headline: Permian Gas Wave Sparks Biggest Pipeline Buildout Since the Shale Boom

headline: Does EPD’s Leadership Move and Pipeline Stake Sale Reveal a New Approach to Commercial Strategy?
summary: Enterprise Products Partners L.P. announced that Michael C. "Tug" Hanley will become executive vice president and chief commercial officer, overseeing all commercial functions across the partnership as of December 1, 2025. This appointment, along with the sale of a 40% stake in the Bahia NGL pipeline to ExxonMobil, highlights Enterprise’s focus on leadership continuity and collaborative infrastructure growth. We'll explore how Hanley’s internal promotion to lead commercial operations may...
